column2: Most events from VIET events will occur, but the silliest ones that break immersion for some are disabled. Choose this for the best balance between serious and light-hearted events.
Disables most of the light-hearted events from VIET. Choose this if you only want the more serious, grounded events.
All events from VIET will happen, including some humorous ones. Choose this if you want the full VIET Events experience.
